info.title: PASOE Management APIs
info.description:
Monitor and manage a PAS for OpenEdge instance with RESTful API calls. Expand each component to list the available APIs. Select the REST verbs (GET, PUT, DELETE, and POST) to view the details for a particular API. Within each reference, use the `Try it out` button to test. These APIs use JSON input/output payloads, so request body content will be JSON where necessary.

Read more about [PASOE Administration](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-reference/page/REST-API-Reference-for-oemanager.war.html). Ask questions and learn from the [OpenEdge Communities](https://community.progress.com/community_groups/openedge_development)

tags.name: AgentManager Administration
tags.description: Manages the Agent Manager's behavior and metrics for an ABL Application

tags.name: SessionManager Administration
tags.description: Manages the Session Manager's behavior and metrics for an ABL Application

delete.description: Clear (reset) the internal MS-Agent statistics

500.description: Could not reset Agent statistics

get.summary: Flushes deferred log to Agent log file.
get.description:
Writes the contents of the deferred log buffer to the Agent log file, and empties the buffer.

See: [Use deferred logging in PAS for OpenEdge](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/Use-deferred-logging-in-PAS-for-OpenEdge.html)

500.description: Could not flush logs

get.description:
Generates an ABLObjects report for all ABL Sessions of an MS-Agent. Returns `null` if tracking is not active or failed to generate the report.

See: [Find Memory Leaks Using ABLObject Tracking](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/Find-memory-leaks-using-ABL-object-tracking.html)

200.description: Successfully retrieved the status of ABLObjects tracking for an MS-Agent

500.description: Could not get status of ABLObjects tracking for an MS-Agent

get.summary: Get ABL Objects Report per ABL Session
get.description:
Generates ABL objects report for an ABL Session in an MS-Agent.

See: [Find Memory Leaks Using ABLObject Tracking](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/Find-memory-leaks-using-ABL-object-tracking.html)

200.description: Successfully retrieved the status of ABLObjects tracking for an ABL Session in a MS-Agent

500.description: Could not get status of ABLObjects tracking for an ABL Session in a MS-Agent

get.description:
Returns the corresponding statistics when given one of the following Component names:

`metrics` = Returns MS-Agent metrics (incl. overhead memory)

`status` = Returns a count of all threads, sessions, requests, connections associated with the MS-Agent thus far

`requests` | `connections` | `threads` = Returns that Component's metrics (either a count, data, or both)

500.description: Unable to retrieve MS-Agent statistics

get.description:
Returns the current metrics for an MS-Agent's sessions.
If a `SessionID` value is provided only that session's metrics will be returned, otherwise all sessions for the MS-Agent will be returned.`

500.description: Unable to retrieve MS-Agent statistics

delete.description:
This terminates all ABL Sessions within the MS-Agent(s) of an ABL application, thereby 'refreshing' the MS-Agents so that changes to the application can be picked up by those agents.

See: [Refresh Agents in an ABL Application](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/Refresh-agents-in-an-ABL-application.html)

500.description: Could not refresh an Agent(s)

get.summary: Get all MS-Agents with Session Metrics
get.description: Lists all MS-Agents with their agentId's, PID's, and state for a given ABL Application, including each MS-Agent's session metrics

500.description: Unable to get the agents list

get.description: Get the ABL Stacks (listing of running programs) for ALL of the ABL Sessions of an MS-Agent

200.description: Successfully retrieved ABL Stacks for the MS-Agent

500.description: Could not retrieve ABL Stacks for the MS-Agent

get.description: Lists all MS-Agents with their  agentId's, PID's, and state for a given ABL Application

500.description: Unable to get the agents list

get.description: Gets the current dynamic ABL Session limit, part of the [Enhanced ABL Session Management](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/Enhanced-ABL-session-management.html) feature.

500.description: Could not reset logs

delete.description:
Resets the dynamic ABL Session limit to a maximum defined by maxABLSessionsPerAgent for an MS-Agent or all application MS-Agents.

See: [Enhanced ABL Session Management](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/Enhanced-ABL-session-management.html)

500.description: Could not reset logs

get.description:
Get the ABL Profiler settings that were set during Enable ABL Profiler API (pushProfilerData).

See: [What is Server-Side Profiling](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/What-is-Server-Side-Profiling.html)

200.description: Successfully retrieved ABL Profiler settings for an MS-Agent

500.description: Could not get ABL Profiler settings for an MS-Agent

get.description: Get the list of AgentManager properties (from openedge.properties)

500.description: Could not retrieve AgentManager Properties

put.description:
Update AgentManager Properties (to openedge.properties)

Note: The property values in the Request body should be updated before executing the request. Deletes the properties that were not modified.

500.description: Could not update AgentManager Properties

get.description: Get ABL Stacks (listing of running programs) for a specific ABL Session of an MS-Agent

200.description: Successfully retrieved ABL Stacks for the ABL Session

500.description: Could not retrieve ABL Stacks for the ABL Session

post.description:
Enable the server-side ABL Profiler for an MS-Agent.
The Profiler Settings is a JSON object which may have the following properties:

Coverage (boolean) - ABL PROFILER:COVERAGE set to true or false; default is false
Statistics (boolean) - ABL PROFILER:STATISTICS set to true or false; default is false
TestRunDescriptor (string) - identifier for this test run, ABL PROFILER:DESCRIPTION, default is `null`
bufsize (integer) - size of buffer in kilobytes for logging profiler data; min/default value is 60, max is 1024
ProcList (string) - filter: csv of procedures to be profiled; empty string means profile all; default is `null`
AdapterMask (string) - filter: csv of adapters: REST, APSV, SOAP, WEB; `null` means accept all; default is `null`
RequestLoBound (integer) - filter: minimum request length to be profiled in millisecs; default is 0
RequestHiBound (integer) - filter: maximum request length to be profiled in millisecs; -1 means no limit; default is -1

Note: The property values in the Request body should be updated before executing the request. Deletes the properties that were not modified.

See: [What is Server-Side Profiling](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/What-is-Server-Side-Profiling.html)

parameters.name: requestCount
parameters.description: Total number of requests to profile

200.description: Successfully enabled ABL Profiler for an MS-Agent

500.description: Could not enable ABL Profiler for an MS-Agent

delete.description: Empties the contents of the deferred log buffer without writing to the Agent log file.

500.description: Could not reset logs

post.description:
Sets the maximum number of ABL Sessions for an MS-Agent or all application MS-Agents.

See: [Enhanced ABL Session Management](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/Enhanced-ABL-session-management.html)

500.description: Could not reset logs

delete.description: Stop (terminate) an MS-Agent using the provided options.

parameters.name: waitToFinish
parameters.description: The number of milliseconds to wait for any current requests to finish before issuing a soft STOP

parameters.name: waitAfterStop
parameters.description: The number of milliseconds to wait after issuing a soft STOP before issuing a hard (untrappable) STOP

500.description: Could not terminate the agent

delete.description:
Terminate an ABL Session in an MS-Agent using one of the following termination options:

`0` - graceful (trappable) stop

`1` - forced (untrappable) stop

`2` - finish request + stop

500.description: Could not terminate ABL Session

get.description:
Checks if the ABLObjects tracking is active for an MS-Agent. Returns `true` if active, `false` if not active.

See: [Find Memory Leaks Using ABLObject Tracking](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/Find-memory-leaks-using-ABL-object-tracking.html)

200.description: Successfully retrieved the status of ABLObjects tracking for an MS-Agent

500.description: Could not get status of ABLObjects tracking for an MS-Agent

put.description:
Turns on and off tracking of ABLObjects (dynamically created objects, instances of ABL classes, memptrs, etc.) for all ABL Sessions of an MS-Agent.

Note: The property values in the Request body should be updated before executing the request. Valid values are `true` or `false`.

See: [Find Memory Leaks Using ABLObject Tracking](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/Find-memory-leaks-using-ABL-object-tracking.html)

500.description: Could not enable/disable ABLObjects tracking

get.description: Returns the APSV metrics for the given oeablservice from the MetricManager instance

500.description: Failed retreieving APSV Metrics

delete.description: Resets the APSV metrics for the given oeablservice from the MetricManager instance

500.description: Failed resetting APSV Metrics

get.summary: Get APSV Transport properties by OEABL WebApp name
get.description: Get APSV Transport properties by OEABL WebApp name

500.description: Failed retreiving APSV transport properties

put.summary: Update APSV Transport properties by OEABL WebApp name
put.description:
Update APSV Transport properties by OEABL WebApp name

Note: The property values in the Request body should be updated before executing the request.Delete the properties that were not modified

500.description: Failed updating APSV transport properties

put.description:
Enables/Disables APSV transport identified by ABLAppName and OEABL WebAppName

Note: The property values in the Request body should be updated before executing the request

500.description: Could not Enable/Disable APSV transport

post.summary: Add a new MS-Agent for an ABL Application
post.description: Creates (starts) a new agent for an ABL application. Returns a new MS-Agent if tracking is not active or fails to generate the report.Throws an exception if maximum number of agents already exists

500.description: Unable to add a new agent for an ABL Application

get.summary: List all the active requests for an ABL Application
get.description:
Returns the list of all the active requests associated with an OEABL Application based on the following:
If timeoutms and requestId are both provided, the method will return the request bounded to the given requestId that is initiated timeoutms milliseconds from the current time.
If timeoutms is not provided but requestId is, the method will return the request bounded to the given requestId.
If timeoutms is provided but not requestId, the method lists all the requests that were initiated timeoutms milliseconds from the current time.

500.description: Unable to retrieve the requests for the ABL AppName

delete.summary: Cancel Requests by RequestID and SessionID
delete.description: Cancel a request with unique ID as `RequestID` and running under HTTP Session with ID as `SessionID`.

500.description: Unable to cancel requests

get.summary: List all the MS-Agent Connections for the ABL Application
get.description: Returns the list of all the MS-Agent Connections for the ABL Applications

500.description: Unable to retrieve the list of sessions

get.summary: Get all services of an ABL Application
get.description: List all webapps and their services deployed in the given ABL Application

200.description: Successfully retrieved all the services for the ABL Application

500.description: Unable to get the list of webapps & services for the ABL Application

get.description: List all ABL Applications for the PASOE Instance

200.description: Successfully retrieved all the ABL Applications

500.description: Unable to get the ABL Applications

get.summary: List all connected Clients for the ABL Application
get.description:
Returns the list of all the Clients connected with an ABL Application.

If `timeoutms` is provided, returns a list of all those clients which are connected over the `timeoutms` time from current time.

Therefore, the API can also be used to fetch all the Clients that are in Hung/IDLE

200.description: Successfully listed all the clients connected

500.description: Unable to retrieve the list clients connected

get.description:
Returns the SessionManager metrics for the given ABL Application. Availability of metrics data is dependent on the value set for the `collectMetrics` property.

See: [Collect Runtime Metrics](https://docs.progress.com/bundle/pas-for-openedge-management/page/Collect-runtime-metrics.html)

500.description: Unable to retrieve ABL Application metrics

delete.description: Resets the SessionManager metrics for the given ABL Application

500.description: Unable to reset ABL Application metrics

get.description: Get SessionManager Properties (from openedge.properties)

500.description: Could not retrieve SessionManager properties

put.description:
Update SessionManager Properties (to openedge.properties)

Note: The property values in the Request body should be updated before executing the request. Deletes the properties that were not modified.

500.description: Could not update SessionManager Properties

get.description:
List all the HTTP client sessions running on a given ABL Application.

If `timeoutms` is provided, returns a list of all those ABL Sessions which are lying idle/inactive over the `timeoutms` time from current time.

200.description: Successfully retrieved all the HTTP Sessions for the given ABL Application

500.description: Unable to retrieve all the HTTP Sessions in the given ABL Application

delete.description:
Terminate an HTTP Session with a given SessionID using one of the following termination options:

`0` - graceful (trappable) stop

`1` - forced (untrappable) stop

`2` - finish request + stop

500.description: Could not terminate the HTTP Session

delete.description: Terminate only the ABL Sessions in an MS-Agent with a state of IDLE

500.description: Unable to terminate IDLE ABL Sessions in an MS-Agent
